Text: Thanks! I already own this but it deserves to be portable!
I had no idea this existed. Thank you! Going to by a hardcopy!

you're welcome dathmung and LincolnRex. i had put "fred hembeck destroys the marvel universe" in my brother voodoo torrent, and i came across this somehow. so i bought it a few weeks ago. if you're in the US, on amazon it's $11 used. you can also buy a new copy - autographed! - directly from www.hembeck.com for $30.
